channel.title: 纽约时报-全球
channel.description: 这是一个追踪纽约时报-全球news的种子

item.title: 哈里王子的律师周五告诉伦敦一家法院，哈里王子已经解决了他对英国一家小报出版商提出的隐私权索赔，两个月前，法官裁定该出版商犯有 "广泛和习惯性 "黑客攻击王子手机的罪行。
item.description: Prince Harry has settled his privacy claims against a British tabloid publisher, his lawyer told a London court on Friday, two months after a judge found the publisher guilty of “widespread and habitual” hacking of the prince’s cellphone. nyti.ms/3SQrIkw

item.title: 泰勒狂热登陆东京。但一些随她而来的斯威夫特人的热情却与当地人的感性发生了冲突。
item.description: Taylor mania has landed in Tokyo. But the enthusiasm of some of the Swifties arriving with her has clashed with local sensibilities. nyti.ms/3UCq4nM

item.title: 在奥莱克桑德-瑟尔斯基将军就任乌克兰最高军事指挥官之际，他可能很快会再次面临严峻的考验：什么时候守卫阵地的代价会超过给敌人造成痛苦所带来的任何好处？
item.description: As Gen. Oleksandr Syrsky assumes his role as Ukraine’s top military commander, he could soon be confronted again with a grim calculus: When does the cost of defending ground outweigh any benefit gained by inflicting pain on the enemy? nyti.ms/3SPvASG

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统呼吁美国 "与俄罗斯谈判 "以结束乌克兰战争，他在周四播出的采访中与前福克斯新闻主持人进行了长达两小时的交谈。
item.description: President Vladimir Putin called on the United States to “negotiate with Russia” to end the war in Ukraine, speaking for two hours with a former Fox News host in an interview broadcast on Thursday. nyti.ms/48a5Xk3

item.title: 保罗-贝南蒂（Paolo Benanti）是一名牧师，他为梵蒂冈和意大利政府提供人工智能伦理方面的建议，在机器看起来更有生命力的时候，他提出了自己的观点，即 "活着意味着什么"。"他说："这是一个精神问题。
item.description: Advising both the Vatican and the Italian government about the ethics of AI, Paolo Benanti, an ordained priest, applies his perspective about what it means to be alive, when machines seem more alive. “This is a spiritual question,” he said. nyti.ms/48dhuz9

item.title: 叙利亚的曼德拉 "里亚德-图尔克（Riad al-Turk）因公开反对阿萨德政权而长期遭受监禁、酷刑和严酷的单独监禁。他已经去世，享年 93 岁。
item.description: Riad al-Turk, “the Mandela of Syria,” endured long years of imprisonment, torture and grim solitary confinement for speaking out against the Assad regimes. He has died at 93. nyti.ms/3HQykZM

item.title: 以安全和宜居为由，博洛尼亚成为意大利第一个将大多数街道的车速限制在每小时 30 公里的大城市。但这对一些人来说太慢了："一位出租车司机抱怨说："城市必须运转起来。
item.description: Bologna has become the first major Italian city to impose a limit of 30 kilometers per hour on most streets, citing safety and livability. But it’s too slow for some: “A city has to move,” one cabby complained. nyti.ms/3HTt9Is

item.title: 他是来自俄罗斯的犹太移民之子，二战期间曾轰炸柏林，后大胆逃生并回到纽约，后来成为所谓的人造圣诞树之王。斯明镜去世，享年99岁：
item.description: The son of Jewish immigrants from Russia, he bombed Berlin during World War II, executed a daring escape and came home to New York, later becoming the so-called king of artificial Christmas trees. Si Spiegel dies at 99: nyti.ms/3OAt9B3

item.title: Apple TV+ 上的 "The New Look "是一档关于时尚的节目，但它也对二战期间法国精英如何向纳粹占领者妥协感兴趣。
item.description: “The New Look” on Apple TV+ is a show about fashion, but it is also interested in how the French elite compromised with Nazi occupants during WWII. nyti.ms/4bGbvWy

item.title: 一年前，当华盛顿和欧洲大部分地区还沉浸在乌克兰即将把俄罗斯赶出其领土的乐观情绪中时，似乎无法想象美国会背弃基辅。现在，这种可能性依然存在。
item.description: A year ago, when Washington and much of Europe were still awash in optimism that Ukraine was on the verge of repelling Russia from its territory, it seemed inconceivable that the U.S would turn its back on Kyiv. Now that possibility remains real. nyti.ms/49ubpPB

item.title: 俄罗斯下月举行大选，总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir V. Putin）几乎肯定会赢得大选。
item.description: What to know about Russia’s election next month, which President Vladimir V. Putin is all but certain to win. nyti.ms/49iFBxg

item.title: 欧足联主席亚历山大-切费林（Aleksander Ceferin）将被允许延长任期。
item.description: Criticism of a move that would allow the president of UEFA, Aleksander Ceferin, to extend his term fell away when it came time to vote on Thursday. nyti.ms/48hLfPq

item.title:
俄罗斯禁止唯一一位曾公开质疑弗拉基米尔-普京总统在俄罗斯掌权并称入侵乌克兰的决定是 "致命错误 "的候选人参加总统竞选。
以下是大选的相关信息。
item.description:
Russia barred from the presidential race the only candidate who had openly contested President Vladimir Putin’s hold on power in Russia, and who called the decision to invade Ukraine a “fatal mistake.”

Here’s what to know about the election. nyti.ms/3UvyOvW

item.title: 在周四的投票中，巴基斯坦强大军方的影响力和动荡的政治局势一览无余。
item.description: As voters cast ballots on Thursday, the influence of Pakistan’s powerful military and the turbulent state of its politics were on full display. nyti.ms/3usZ4fS

item.title: 即时新闻：乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）解除了其高级将领的职务，这是两年前俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来最大的一次领导层调整。
item.description: Breaking News: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine removed his top general in the biggest leadership shake-up since Russia’s invasion two years ago. nyti.ms/48c63rt

item.title: 社交媒体上广泛流传着以色列士兵分享的视频，他们在庆祝加沙的房屋和其他民用建筑被摧毁。
item.description: En las redes sociales circulan ampliamente videos compartidos por soldados israelíes celebrando la destrucción de lo que parecen ser casas y otros edificios civiles en Gaza. nyti.ms/3uB8d61

item.title: 巴西联邦警察针对前总统博尔索纳罗和许多亲密顾问及前部长开展了一次大范围行动，作为对企图推翻巴西 2022 年大选和其他涉嫌犯罪行为的调查的一部分。
item.description: The Brazilian federal police carried out a sweeping operation that targeted former President Jair Bolsonaro and many close advisers and former ministers as part of an investigation into efforts to overturn Brazil’s 2022 election and other alleged crimes. nyti.ms/3SyywSh

item.title: 去年夏天首次笼罩地球的异常温暖将持续到 2024 年：欧盟气候监测机构宣布，上个月是有史以来最热的一月。
item.description: The exceptional warmth that first enveloped the planet last summer is continuing strong into 2024: Last month clocked in as the hottest January ever measured, the European Union climate monitor announced. nyti.ms/3StMmFH

item.title: 冰岛西南部的一个火山系统于周四喷发，这是自 12 月以来的第三次喷发，从大约 30 英里外的冰岛首都雷克雅未克就能看到喷涌而出的鲜橙色熔岩。
item.description: A volcano system in southwestern Iceland erupted on Thursday, for the third time since December, with fountains of bright orange lava visible from Iceland’s capital, Reykjavik, about 30 miles away. nyti.ms/3OCSPNs

item.title:
分析人士称，巴基斯坦的这次选举将是该国历史上最不可信的选举之一。这次投票正值巴基斯坦动荡不安的时刻。
以下是需要了解的信息。
item.description:
Analysts say the election in Pakistan will be among the least credible in the country’s history. The vote comes at a particularly turbulent moment for the nation.

Here’s what to know. nyti.ms/3SNuMh8

item.title: 五角大楼称，美国在伊拉克实施的报复性打击打死了伊朗支持的一个组织的一名高级领导人，美国官员指责该组织最近袭击了美国人员。
item.description: A U.S. retaliatory strike in Iraq killed a senior leader of an Iran-backed group that U.S. officials blamed for recent attacks on American personnel, the Pentagon said. nyti.ms/3SQWsSj

item.title: 巴基斯坦人称这是一次 "遴选"--而非选举。随着选民们周四前往投票站，巴基斯坦强大军方的影响力和动荡的政治局势一览无余。
item.description: Pakistanis have labeled it a “selection” — not an election. As voters headed to the polls on Thursday, the influence of Pakistan’s powerful military and the turbulent state of its politics were on full display. nyti.ms/3UsISG5

item.title: 伊登-戈兰（Eden Golan）将代表以色列参加五月的欧洲电视网。尽管这场盛大的演出并不明显是战争的代言，但加沙冲突似乎将为这场比赛蒙上阴影。
item.description: Eden Golan will represent Israel in Eurovision in May. Though the high-camp spectacle is not an obvious proxy for war, the contest looks set to be overshadowed by the conflict in Gaza. nyti.ms/498zZ9g

item.title: "赛义杜-特拉奥雷说："Lêkê是象牙海岸的国鞋。
item.description: “Lêkê are the national shoes of Ivory Coast,” said Seydou Traoré, his feet resting inside an orange pair. nyti.ms/4bqC8hY

item.title: 在基辅的不确定性加剧之际，俄罗斯向乌克兰各地城市发射了大量导弹和无人机。
item.description: A Russian barrage directed missiles and drones at cities across Ukraine at a moment of heightened uncertainty for Kyiv. nyti.ms/3upeSjE

item.title: "如果有人穿着合适的运动鞋来，我们就会取笑他：'你以为你是职业球员还是什么？伊利亚斯-萨诺戈（Iliass Sanogo）一边说，一边看着一群朋友在朦胧的暮色中踢球，他们都穿着lêkê。
item.description: “Let a guy come with proper sneakers and we’ll make fun of him: ‘You think you’re a professional player or what?’” Iliass Sanogo said as he watched a group of friends — all wearing lêkê — play in the hazy twilight. nyti.ms/4bwS96b

item.title: 英国王位继承人威廉王子在其父查尔斯三世国王宣布罹患癌症两天后，于周三重返公众舞台，试图表现出一种坚毅的平常心。
item.description: Prince William, the heir to the British throne, stepped back onto the public stage Wednesday, trying to project a steely sense of normalcy, two days after the announcement that his father, King Charles III, had been struck by cancer. nyti.ms/3Sz6u9z

item.title: 欧盟委员会表示，它正在就匈牙利最近通过的针对外国人在该国活动的立法启动一项纪律处分程序。
item.description: The European Commission says it is opening a disciplinary procedure against Hungary over recently passed legislation that focuses on the activities of foreigners in the country. nyti.ms/3w9KXN5

item.title: 瑞典结束了对连接俄罗斯和西欧的北溪天然气管道遭受海底袭击事件的调查，理由是缺乏进一步追究责任人的权力。
item.description: Sweden closed an investigation into the undersea attack on the Nord Stream gas pipelines that link Russia to Western Europe, citing a lack of authority to further pursue those responsible. nyti.ms/48aFClI

item.title:
RT by @nytimesworld：谁创造了黄油鸡？
在我们开始讨论之前：是的，很难证明是哪一个人创造了如今无处不在的美食。而且，这么多年过去了，这还重要吗？第一并不意味着最好。
item.description:
Who Created Butter Chicken?

Before we dig in: Yes, it’s hard to prove that any single person came up with dishes that have become ubiquitous. Also, does it even matter after all these years? Being first doesn’t necessarily mean being best.

nytimes.com/2024/02/07/world…
